Evalute (:py:mod:`~lingpy.evaluate`)
=====================================

.. currentmodule:: lingpy.evaluate.acd

This module provides functions that can be used to evaluate the results of different analyses in
quantitative historical linguistics, such as cognate detection analyses, or alignment analyses.

---------
